divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was Driving Northbound I5 To Eastbound 76 I saw a large triangle glowing red above the Clouds. The object was very large and took up a large portion of the sky. It had to be at least a mile in size. After getting home I looked in the direction of the object and could still see the faint glow and a random rapid flashing like lighning to the right but no thunder. This was also witnessed by my passenger.
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Oceanside
There were no other sightings in Oceanside on or around May 7th 2008
Summary: Glowing Red Triangle Over Camp Pendleton Marine Corp Base
